verses.name: Hebrews 11:15
verses.text: And truly, if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out, they might have had opportunity to have returned.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:16
verses.text: But now they desire a better country, that is, an heavenly: wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God: for he hath prepared for them a city.

verses.name: Hebrews 11:17
verses.text: By faith Abraham, when he was tried, offered up Isaac: and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son,

verses.name: Hebrews 11:18
verses.text: Of whom it was said, That in Isaac shall thy seed be called:
